topic: The EU should have a president elected directly by the people.
argument: The president of the EU is not directly elected by people, and this should change.

topic: Denial of the Holocaust should be illegal.
argument: The Holocuast was a tragedy. It should not be denied.

topic: Prostitution should be legal.
argument: Prohibition of prostitution is unconstitutional.

topic: Fat air passengers should be charged extra for their extra weight.
argument: It is not fair to charge passengers based on their weight, as it is out of their control.

topic: The Commonwealth should be abolished.
argument: The commonwealth is a good idea.

topic: The assassination of a dictator can be justified.
argument: The killing of an individual is never justifiable.

topic: Mandating calorie counts on restaurant menus is good public policy.
argument: Mandated calories on menues is not a good policy because it does not take into account the nutritional value of the food.

topic: Schools have the right to search students' lockers.
argument: School searches of lockets violate students privacy.

topic: High speed rail development is generally good policy.
argument: High-speed rail is expensive and not worth the cost.

topic: Marriage to more than one person should be legal.
argument: Marrying more people than is allowed is not good for society.

topic: Children should be allowed to work in the performing arts or professional sports.
argument: Children are not ready to perform in professional settings.

topic: Assisted suicide should be legalized.

topic: The assassination of a dictator can be justified.

topic: Iraq should be partitioned into three autonomous sectarian regions.

topic: Governments should completely ban laser pointers.
argument: Laser points are used by people for safety.

argument: Year round schools would be a bad idea because kids would get bored.

argument: It is important to keep out people who are not citizens of the United States.

argument: Full- body scanners are effective in finding terrorists.

topic: Governments should introduce identity cards and require each citizen to carry one.
argument: Identity cards can be stolen.

topic: Pornography offers a valuable public service.
argument: Purity is a good thing. Pure people are better people. We should not allow pornography.

argument: Scotland is not the same as England. It should be given more power. Wales should also be granted more autonomy. Devolving power to Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland will be good.

topic: Mass migration, especially from developing to developed countries, is a good force.
argument: Mass migrations are good for developing countries. They can learn from developed nations. This is the best way to improve. Developed nations can also benefit. It will help them to grow and develop too. Mass immigration is good.

argument: National identity cards are unnecessary. They are not required by law.

argument: Aborted fetuses have no chance of living.
